metadata.title: Chokin' and Tokin' in the Queen City

tracks.text: She tries on a coat marked stolen
At Uncle Cheech's funeral
Darkness
Jimmy floats, eyes wide
He nears a white light
He goes towards the light, and gets stuck in a hole.
He struggles
He squeezes through, and drops into a field of clouds in front of golden gates
In a bar
Jimmy's face turns purple. Cheech squeezes him. A sausage flies from Jimmy's mouth, into a nearby man, who chokes, turns green, and collapses.
They walk down the street.
He stands by a dumpster. A biker drives by him to the end of the alley, where burly men hold green bags and nerdy boys stand awkwardly.
Jimmy knocks ash from his cigar, which lands on a cat, which jumps on Jimmy's face, scratching.

Jimmy throws the cat, which hits the dumpsters, which dominoes a row of motorcycles, which knocks over a burning barrel, which makes a man scream and drop the green bags, which catch on fire, which sparks fire on a puddle of oil. The fire travels up to an engine and explodes. Flying debris hits a fire escape latter, which falls and knocks over thugs like dominoes. The nerdy boys gape at the fire and thug pile. They run.
Jimmy sighs and slumps against a dumpster
He lassoes the thugs
At the house, Cookie and Gina stand around the kitchen island.
Cookie taps a filet with a meat tenderizer hammer.
Gina taps, then hits, the meat. It spurts blood and she smiles.
Blood splatters Cookie
Blood splatters the kitchen. Gina hits the flattened meat.
Petey and Theresa watch TV
At the a drabby, boarded up building called the Beer N Belch
They leave the man yo yo'd
Jimmy runs after a man carrying a purse. Jimmy uses a yo yo to catch the man, who drops the purse. A newspaper depicts the man with the headline, Crime Rate Down in Regina.
A mustached man runs into an alley, looking around. Jimmy hits him in the face with a yo yo, then hog ties him and runs off.
Jimmy enters GAP for Vigilantes. 50% off Speedos. Wax and Body Oil for Sale.
Jimmyu leaves with a black mask that goes around his eyes.
Headline, "You been yo-yoed!"
At GAP FOR YO-YO's, Jimmy exits with a box in japanese full of yo-yo's.
He sees a schnauzer in a car. Jimmy smiles. A red headed man grabs the dog out of the car and runs. Jimmy yo-yo's the red head. The dog licks Jimmy's face.
At the house
Gina yo-yo's Theresa's nail polish
Gina yo-yo's Theresa in the head
Jimmy kisses Gina's forehead
Basement
Petey pulls up Jimmy's shirt, revealing dozens of yo-yo's.
Jimmy then Cheech
Petey pulls Jimmy's finger. A laser beam shoots out of Jimmy's butt, hitting the TV, which turns red then explodes.
McCool messages, Could you & Cheech come see me ASAP?
A hologram of a scantily clad blonde woman. She waves.
At the house, Theresa cuts a yo-yo outline out of a piece of paper. She places it over a flashlight and points it at the sky.
The yo-yo signal appears in the sky. And another one.
Regina Museum of Stuff
At the house
Outside
At the Keanu Reeves Correctional Institute, a yellow truck approaches armed guards at a gate. Jimmy and Cheech ride under the truck bed.
Cheech's feet dangle behind the car. A guard sees the shoes and shrugs.
Jimmy and Cheech walk through water in a sewer pipe.
They gape at a fan up ahead.
They chew
Pull fingers
And shoot lasers from their butts at the fan.
It explodes.
They walk along the walls of the prison.
They jump on passing cops and steal their uniforms.
O J
Jimmy scans the man, Cheech, then the man again.
Tony rips off his head, revealing a giant horned, red demon
In the alley way by the dumpster
Cheech looks at his hands and wiggles his fingers
Cheech rips off his head
Jimmy slaps Cheech while they sit by the dumpster
